meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>face</kanji> of this object is so <kanji>white</kanji>! Why is it so white compared to everything else? This is so <vocabulary>interesting</vocabulary>...
readingMnemonic: The reading is unlike what you've learned before, at least with the 面 part (白い is just like the vocab word 白い). When you look at the white face of the object you say to your friend Moe: "<reading>Oh mo</reading>!" (おも) because you want him to come over and look at this. Try to imagine someone you know named Moe, or at least a celebrity or something named Moe.
